lead_paragraph: Another seam-friendly wicket stacks the odds overwhelmingly in favour of hosts South Africa when they take on Sri Lanka in the second test at Newlands, starting on Monday.
snippet: Another seam-friendly wicket stacks the odds overwhelmingly in favour of hosts South Africa when they take on Sri Lanka in the second test at Newlands, starting on Monday....

headline.main: Newlands' Seam-Friendly Wicket Favours South Africa
headline.print_headline: Newlands' Seam-Friendly Wicket Favours South Africa
